title: Optional media on chatroom creation (single media type preserved)

requirements.summary: Allow creating a chatroom without any media while keeping media tabs visible and preserving single-media behavior and validations when media is provided.
acceptanceCriteria: In CreateChatroomDialog, the Image/Video/Twitter tabs remain visible even if the user does not attach media.
The form can be submitted successfully when topic/description/category are filled and no media is provided.
No validation error is shown solely because the media URL/file is empty (errors only appear when the user provides a media value that is invalid).
When media is provided, only one media type is submitted (as before) and existing validations for the chosen media type still apply.

file_operations.description: Update CreateChatroomDialog submission and validation logic to make media optional: (1) remove any required-media gating in isFormValid so topic/description/category can submit without media; (2) stop setting mediaError when mediaUrl is cleared/empty; (3) ensure handleSubmit submits empty mediaUrl/mediaType when no media is selected, while still validating image/video/twitter only when a value/file is provided and still submitting only the chosen single media type.
